title: Escape the Deal
tags: how to unlock escape the deal
content:
Escape the Deal Type Quest Act Act 3 Location House of Hope Reward Orphic HammerAmulet of Greater HealthGauntlets of Frost Giant Strength

Escape the Deal is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Escape the Deal can be acquired during Act 3. This quest is part of the Personal Quests that you can get in the game. It is a subquest of the Deal with the Devil. An alternative to this quest is to Fulfill the Deal. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3,
